text.data: Chapter 26 Alexander, King of the Holy Dragons[end]
Matelite: Hey! Dragonites inside! We've come from Orelus! We're here to free you! Just wait a little longer![end]
Matelite: I think they heard![end]
Taicho: Alexander heard as well![end]
Matelite: We've all come this far... So we're in this together![end]
Final Chapter We, Who Cannot See into Tomorrow[end]
Matelite: Alexander has revived! Hurry with the preparations![end]

[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons explained it to me. The monsters in Orelus were also Dragonites. Valitora changed their forms to prevent the awakening of Bahamut. Bahamut did the same thing... But Bahamut changed the Dragonites into creatures with wings.
He did it so they could someday fly into the sky and return to their homeland.[end]
Excellent![end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... If we can just defeat Alexander one more time, I'll take care of the rest. I'm sure I'll be alright.[end]
Palpaleos: This is it...[end]
Palpaleos: I'm against [character][0x1]'s idea, but...[end]
[character][0x1]: But that's all we can do.[end]

Matelite: Okay, [character][0x1]! This should be our final battle! There's nothing more to say! Are we all set?
It'll take a little bit longer. Let's go, Matelite![end1]
I leave it in your hands, [character][0x1].[end]

Matelite: Right!
Oh, wait a minute...[end]
Matelite: I have a favor to ask of you, Palpaleos.[end]
Matelite: This might be the last time we're both alive together. The end. Will you let me say something to you?[end]

Matelite: What should I do, [character][0x1]?
Say as much as you want! Forget it.[end1]
Matelite: [character][0x1]. I'm sure... You too...[end]
Taicho: There are many monsters![end]
Matelite: Damn! Something's come up![end]
Matelite: Okay, this is the final assault![end]

Matelite: How are the preparations?!
Don't be impatient, Matelite! Let's go, Matelite![end1]
Matelite: Hurry![end]

Matelite: Members of the Orelus Freedom Force!
Let's win this battle... and go home![end]

Taicho: Have you calmed down, [character][0x1]?
No. Because you guys are here.[end1]
I see... When you say that I feel much stronger.[end]
Sendak: Let us return safely to Orelus...[end]
Sendak: It is hopeless, [character][0x1]... No matter how many times we defeat him, Alexander will continue to revive...[end]
Rush: This stuff's so heavy I might accidentally break it![end]
Weapons? Armor? Items?[end1]
Rush: Let's hurry, [character][0x1]![end]

Truce: From what I've seen... Whenever Matelite randomly behaves well... That's when he realizes the enemy is clearly stronger than us.
Captain [character][0x1]! Make thorough preparations![end]

Truce: Captain [character][0x1]. There is no room for impatience at times like this.
Please don't go feeding anything strange to the dragons.[end]
Bikkebakke: This is it, [character][0x1]![end]
I'll buy some mushrooms! I want some books. Matelite-brand merchandise...[end1]
We're going home soon![end]
I'll buy some mushrooms! I want some books. Matelite-brand merchandise...[end1][end]
